## colorManipulator namespace

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

### colorManipulator namespace

<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { colorManipulator } from '@grafana/data';
```

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [alpha(color, value)](./alpha/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Set the absolute transparency of a color. Any existing alpha values are overwritten. |
|  [asHexString(color)](./ashexstring/) | Converts a color to hex6 format if there is no alpha, hex8 if there is. |
|  [darken(color, coefficient)](./darken/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Darkens a color. |
|  [decomposeColor(color)](./decomposecolor/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns an object with the type and values of a color.<!-- -->Note: Does not support rgb % values. |
|  [emphasize(color, coefficient)](./emphasize/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Darken or lighten a color, depending on its luminance. Light colors are darkened, dark colors are lightened. |
|  [getContrastRatio(foreground, background, canvas)](./getcontrastratio/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Calculates the contrast ratio between two colors.<!-- -->Formula: https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/G17.html\#G17-tests |
|  [getLuminance(color, background)](./getluminance/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The relative brightness of any point in a color space, normalized to 0 for darkest black and 1 for lightest white.<!-- -->Formula: https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/G17.html\#G17-tests |
|  [hexToRgb(color)](./hextorgb/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts a color from CSS hex format to CSS rgb format. |
|  [hslToRgb(color)](./hsltorgb/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts a color from hsl format to rgb format. |
|  [lighten(color, coefficient)](./lighten/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Lightens a color. |
|  [recomposeColor(color)](./recomposecolor/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts a color object with type and values to a string. |
|  [rgbToHex(color)](./rgbtohex/) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Converts a color from CSS rgb format to CSS hex format. |
